attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every 4 years we have an extra day - February 29th. It is unfair that hourly paid workers clock on and get paid 1/365th more in the year than salaried workers. However, we do get 'free' car tax, insurance, council tax etc. for this one day. Lets celebrate this 'free' day with a bank holiday!
